title: Did Trump spend more taxpayers' dollars on personal travel than Obama?
subtitle: Despite preliminary indications that government travel expenses for the Trump family are higher than Obama, Internet rumours are exaggerated.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Only nine months after President Trump and his family took office, they have already spent $147 million on personal travel, equivalent to one and a half times what President Obama and his family spent during the eight years of the President ' s last presidency.
